Author: unmerited-space
Text: When I'm tryna look ~normal~ I make miso soup!! I just make it with only the miso paste and I add some salt. Tbh the only way for me to get salt in that doesn't make me vom

Author: autumnbabyxo
Text: I purge so this topic is of great importance for me! I recommend Nuun electrolyte tablets. They dissolve in water and the flavors are pretty nice. They contain vitamins and electrolytes, and only have 10 calories. I drink these after purging to prevent fainting!
